div.div:
Assessment
PEFR
National Early warning score (NEWS) incl. HR, RR, Oxygen saturation
Signs and symptoms
Clinical examination

li.p: Nebulised (via oxygen drive) high dose Beta 2 agonists

ul.li: g. 2.5-5mg nebulised salbutamol at 15-30 min intervals

li.p: Ipratropium bromide 500 microgram via an oxygen-driven nebuliser

ul.li: 40-50mg prednisolone PO OD for 5 days. If oral route not possible – IV hydrocortisone 100mg

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
